channel.title: Health Report - Full program podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Health Report appeals to both specialist and mainstream audiences by applying a broad definition of health, and seeing health and medicine within social, scientific and political contexts. One single audio file of the whole program - good for continuous listening.
channel.description: The Health Report appeals to both specialist and mainstream audiences by applying a broad definition of health, and seeing health and medicine within social, scientific and political contexts. One single audio file of the whole program - good for continuous listening.

item.itunes:subtitle: In the last of the Global Body series Lynne Malcolm is joined by a panel of experts to discuss the future of the health of the human body. This four-part series is a co-production with the BBC.
